name: Posteria : Web to WordPress to Social Media Content Suite
author: isoluce

sections.description:
Connect Posteria to WordPress, enter your favorite topics, watch content flood, share and enrich it automatically, share it to your social media and even your newsletter … And much more stay tuned ðŸ˜‰

Features

  • Enables OAuth and Api on your wordpress and connect it to Posteria
  • Receive fresh new content every day about your favorite topics
  • Share it to your blog
  • Share it then to your social media to deliver traffic
  • Share it to your newsletter for nurturing puroposes and get more customer retension
  • Sit down, look at your stats grow and relax ðŸ™‚

How to Use

Visit https://posteria.fr for detailed instructions.

Licensing

Posteria is free to use. Please support the project by licensing. You can view more information at

Minimum Requirements

  • PHP 5.6.4 or greater (latest version recommended)

Other Information

Support

Support requests should be made by opening a support request at https://posteria.fr/contactez-nous/.
sections.installation:
1. Upload Posteria to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory or use the built in plugin install by WordPress
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. You’re Ready to Rock
sections.faq:
Is there support for this plugin? Can you help me?

You can visit our https://posteria.fr/contactez-nous/ to open up a support request directly with developers.

Can you set this up for me on my current website?

  • DRINKS COFFEE * Can I? “YES”. You are more than welcome to contact us with if you should ever need assistance.
sections.changelog:
1.9.7

  • NEW: notice on activate plugin.

1.9.0

  • NEW: Create Client id and secret by default.
  • NEW: let oAuth active by default.
  • NEW: disable view .

1.8.0

  • Fix variavle session
  • Integration of oAuth system

1.7.0

  • Fix variavle session
  • Added wo_me_resource_return filter to default “me” resource.
  • Removed debug information for access tokens.
  • Updated “n” return encoding for public keys.

1.6.0

  • graphic update
  • apply_filters( ‘wo_unset_refresh_token_after_use’, false )
  • Minor tweak to the status license box

1.5.0

  • Configure default parameter for posteria
  • FIX: Bug in redirect URI during authentication code flow. Now uses home_url()
  • FIX: Bug that allowed for client ID’s to be search able.

1.4.0

  • Meta tags in header

1.3.0

  • add meta tags for twitter linkedin and facebook

1.2.0

  • Graphic update

1.1.0

  • Refactored style names.
  • Add banner and icon.
  • Optimized DB structure.

1.0.0

  • Added Posteria by iSoluce.
  • Tested …
